entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is suspicious and moodily responding to George's statement.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who is helping himself to a kipper and advertising for testers on the Gryffindor notice board.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is eyeing Fred and George beadily and trying to stop them from advertising for testers on the Gryffindor notice board.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as the one who is sniggering with George and buttering a crumpet.

entities.name: skiving snackbox
entities.description: Skiving Snackboxes are mentioned as the product that Fred and George are advertising for testers on the Gryffindor notice board.

relationships.description: Hermione opposes the advertisement of Skiving Snackboxes on the Gryffindor notice board.
Fred and George are advertising their product, Skiving Snackboxes, to Hermione.
